00033 class SURFIT_EXPORT points {
00034 public:
00035 
00037         points();
00038         
00048         points(REAL *& X_begin, REAL * X_end, 
00049                REAL *& Y_begin, REAL * Y_end, 
00050                REAL *& Z_begin, REAL * Z_end,
00051                const char * points_name = NULL);
00052 
00054         virtual ~points();
00055 
00057         int size() const;
00058 
00060         REAL mean() const;
00061 
00063         REAL minx() const;
00064 
00066         REAL maxx() const;
00067 
00069         REAL miny() const;
00070 
00072         REAL maxy() const;
00073 
00075         REAL minz() const;
00076 
00078         REAL maxz() const;
00079 
00081         REAL std(REAL mean) const;
00082                          
00084         REAL * X_begin;
00086         REAL * X_end;
00088         REAL * Y_begin; 
00090         REAL * Y_end;   
00092         REAL * Z_begin; 
00094         REAL * Z_end;   
00095 
00097         bool plus(const points * pnts);
00098 
00100         bool minus(const points * pnts);
00101         
00103         bool mult(const points * pnts);
00104 
00106         bool div(const points * pnts);
00107 
00109         bool set(const points * pnts);
00110 
00112         void plus(REAL val);
00113 
00115         void minus(REAL val);
00116 
00118         void mult(REAL val);
00119 
00121         void div(REAL val);
00122 
00124         void set(REAL val);
00125 
00126 };

00131 class SURFIT_EXPORT sub_points {
00132 public:
00133 
00135         sub_points(int icell_number, 
00136                    std::vector<unsigned int> * ipoint_numbers);
00137         
00139         ~sub_points();
00140 
00142         REAL value(const points * pnts) const;
00144         REAL sum_value(const points * pnts) const;
00146         REAL value(const wtask * wtsk) const;
00148         REAL weight(const wtask * wtsk) const;
00149 
00151         unsigned int cell_number;
00153         std::vector<unsigned int> * point_numbers;
00154         
00155 };

00157 typedef std::vector<sub_points *> sub_tasks;
